website_summaries.verdict: All-around performance with an affordable price tag. Makes a great upgrade or secondary trolling rod.
pros: 2-piece construction makes the trolling rod convenient to take apart and store when not in use
Uses extra EVA padding to keep the rod protected from dents and scratches when mounted
cons: Has more play and flexibility than other professional trolling rods

customer_reviews.title: Great rods
customer_reviews.text: These are great rods. We use them on our salmon charter up here in Alaska and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these rods for salmon fishing on the Columbia River, I purchased two Okuma Line counter reels to put on them and they have proved to be a very good purchase. I have caught several salmon on them the biggest was 27 pounds and the rods and reels have worked great. Very comfortable and had great action from the poles. Highly recommend for those that want a great rod and reel at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Coplin SR

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for less!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod for a budget minded fisherman. Trolling on the Great Lakes is an expensive endeavor, glad to see Okuma stepped up to provide a quality rod at a reasonable price! I use it with dipsy divers, paired with an Okuma Magda Pro 15DXT reel and it works great! This setup can be had for ~$80. Love my Okuma tackle!
customer_reviews.author: Radacal

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice rod - hopefully a salmon killer!
customer_reviews.text: Got the 8.5ft medium action rods for salmon mooching\trolling in Puget Sound or the WA Coast, and these look awesome. Nice design, great grips, and awesome looking overall. Gave them both the "whip test" to verify no cracked ferrules and to test the action. Very cool. Can't wait to get them in the water next season!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: 20lb lake trout!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod and reel !! Superior fishing at its best!! Was using other rods and reels and decided to buy one okama to try !! Best decision ever ! We are now in the process of switching all of our poles to them!!! Have six now so going to get 6 more!! You will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rod for the price point. The rod handle is holding up better than the 3x more expensive Lamiglas I bought at the same time. The EVA handle is more durable in the rod holder than cork, due to the strain of the rod loading up in the downrigger.
customer_reviews.author: Merrilee Readicker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rod! Fished with it today
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod! Fished with it today. Sections come apart with out binding. Casts very well even with the smaller guides. Grip is comfortable and gives you good control over the rod. It's also a good looking piece of equipment. Overall I'm pretty impressed as I usually am with Okuma. Lots of quality for your money.
customer_reviews.author: KBaird83

customer_reviews.title: Fits like an old glove
customer_reviews.text: I wore my old downrigger rod out, so I took a shot at this one on Amazon. A quick reel transfer later and I'm back in business. Fish proven, bent rod tested - yup, you can land salmon with this. For a bargain price too (compared to G Wiz ..)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This rod will catch fish
customer_reviews.text: Great rods at great prices. I use these for a downrigger that I made. They have the perfect bend in my opinion to set that hook when the fish hits it. These are paired with okuma line counter reels. Plenty of eyelets to support the total weight. I'm not sure why others are complaining about the integrity of the rod blank. It is a great rod!
customer_reviews.author: chaser

customer_reviews.title: received 2 of these rods with broken tips
customer_reviews.text: could not believe my eyes when i opened the second box from amazon. it looked like they repacked the first broken rod and sent it back to me (probably not). but it was broken in the same spot as the first rod! i had high hopes and amazon has rarely let me down. but this time it was a sad performance on their part!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: POORLY PACKAGED AND WAS BROKE
customer_reviews.text: This fishing rod came in a box that was completely flattened, mangled in result of which, my rod came broken at the tip! I was counting on using this rod on a fishing trip that I'm going on and can no longer use. I'm VERY upset about this! Rods need to come properly packaged in a cylinder tube!
customer_reviews.author: JLaVay

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with the rod
customer_reviews.text: You absolutely cannot go wrong if your looking for a budget trolling rod. I used this yesterday for a loaner rod on my boat and landed 2 salmon trolling in the 10lb range. I did epoxy the rod to a one piece for rigidity and for $28 it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: BGoat

customer_reviews.title: OKUMA Classic Pro GLT 7'-6" ML Great Downrigger Rod for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Okuma Classic Pro GLT downrigger rod, been using these for years for stripers and trout. Have my DR rods paired up with Okuma line counters size 20 and 30 reels, cant go wrong with this combo under $100!.
customer_reviews.author: ICCS(SW)

customer_reviews.title: Okuma is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 and they are awesome. Looks amazing strong hold and comes with warranty. DO NOT THINK JUST BUY TRUST ME
customer_reviews.author: justin biddle

customer_reviews.title: On time, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and caught fish both times, it is a little stiffer than I wanted, but that is my fault. I will order the Salmon/Steelhead model. The upper handle above the reel is in a Diamond shape, feels good in your hand. Fit and finish is good. Overall nice rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for a great rod.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a great rod. I use them as downrigger rods for trolling on Lake Michigan. Flexible enough to be able to properly load when attached to the downrigger but also has plenty of backbone to fight Lake Michigan king salmon. You really can't go wrong with this rod.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: BMW key
customer_reviews.text: i got my order but i found a BMW keys in side the box who ever lost his car keys i have them
customer_reviews.author: sidali labdi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic rods for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and workmanship beyond its price point. I like the triangular fore grip and the fit and finish is surprisingly good. I have 2 of these now and would recommend them to anyone who trolls with downriggers or dipsy divers.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: You will like this rod.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rod and works very very well trolling and downrigging for laketrout and salmon. This is my new go to downrigging rod. It has the perfect strength and perfect weight. This is my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B

customer_reviews.title: Great rods for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 8 of these fishing rods for my boat. These downrigger rods have many hours on them and have worked well on some very good sized rainbows. Great Rods, fantastic price point.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rods for trolling Lake Michigan.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Okuma trolling rods and pair them with Okuma Convector reels for every trolling set up I have. I have not had any problems with these rods and they seem to hold up well and are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Hmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in great as described new condition, will probably buy another asap.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great salmon rod. It's too big/heavy for lighter weight fish tho. Great tip, lots of action.
customer_reviews.author: Kevo

customer_reviews.title: Good surf fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew for his birthday. He caught 12 fish the first day he used it. Of course, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SKC

customer_reviews.title: great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this pole about a dozen times now and it works great. The pole has great action and reels in hybrid striper with no problem. I just ordered a second one for the other side of the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Price is great, but it’s not sturdy as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kitkit

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet, but it appears well made with plenty of eyes for even weight distribution to rod.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Only one use and the oring came out
customer_reviews.text: One use and the tip of the rod the plastic ring oring came out. This also happened to me with another okuma model
customer_reviews.author: Oscar F. Jamardo

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good trolling rods for harnesses or crankbaits with planer boards.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a fast action tip for planer boards
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff for pulling inline boards, will work good for dipseys
customer_reviews.author: dominic

customer_reviews.title: Broken rod.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rod, light and just the right length to use with a downriver. Unfortunately, the rod broke 2 inches from the tip the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it was a little thicker to use for a boat rod but will give it a try. Quick delivery good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, yet sensitive enough
customer_reviews.text: Managed to use this rod over the weekend on Lake Michigan trolling with a Walker (now Lurk) Deeper Diver (size 107). Coupled with an Okuma Magna Pro 30 with line counter (used power pro 30 lb test). Worked flawlessly trolling at 60 to 70 feet. Sturdy, yet sensitive enough. Caught fish on flies and spoons. Personally, though some swear by 8' rods, the 10' foot length gives you the extra couple of feet to bring fish to the boat with all of those contraptions on the line (diver, snubber, (a flasher), leader, bait). I'd recommend this rod, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBonneville

customer_reviews.title: Great length and action for a downriver.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boat rod for my needs. Sets up nicely with the downriver. I have several Okuma rods in various actions and lengths. Great rod for the money.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Junk broken crap sent to me
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement for a broken recieved item. As a professional guide I will never order okuma again. Junk products out of the box
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Shipped a broken rod
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't need the rod this week, it would have been shipped back. came with a smashed 2nd eye no insert in the packaging so it wasn't in the shipment falt. I feel someone just palmed off on a broken rod. Luckily I know how to tie on a new eye. still POed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Rod for copper line fishing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my 32lb and 60lb copper line rigs. Good quality rod and stainless eyes work well with copper line. Only 2 months of use so far, but no issues
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the triangle shaped handle
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rod but I did not like the feel of the triangle shaped handle above the reel seat. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half a rod
customer_reviews.text: Received only bottom pcs supposed to be two pieces did not receive the top piece🤦🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: jorge saenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rods, load up nicely. Well made for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Marcell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the 7’ 6” medium action lake troller today. I ordered 2 based off reviews and haven’t used it but will when i use it a couple times overall so far looks are great seems sturdy enough to troll for white bass and still be able to land big cats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice pole! Made for a another great day on ...
customer_reviews.text: Caught my first fish on it last week... nice pole! Made for a another great day on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Zakkattack

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was good, the product is a very good value for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and have a third on the way. Packaging was good, the product is a very good value for the money. For about $30 each, I have a very good set of down rigger rods that I can abuse for fishing the Puget Sound of Wa State. I'd rather break the tip of a $30 fiberglass rod, throw it away and have a spare ready to go than a $150+ Loomis or Llamii..... Great value for the money! So far, no performance issues and I've been fishing everyday during the month of Aug and into the first part of Sept 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Wa St

customer_reviews.title: Broken before shipped
customer_reviews.text: It was broken in the box. The broken piece wasn’t even in the box so it was shipped this way. I’m sending it back for another.
customer_reviews.author: Dblaker

customer_reviews.title: Just received this was to be a Christmas present for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this was to be a Christmas present for my husband and only the base of the rod was shipped no packing list either.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for years great rod for the money
customer_reviews.author: John Corfont

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice but literally broke the first time I went trolling with it caught a 5 pound fish and set the hook, the bole snapped in half worst money I ever spent wasn't even on the water an hour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have a long handle landing net depending on the vessel size
customer_reviews.text: Trolling with leadcore line it has good backbone and flexibility
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: WAS DISAPPOINTED!..UPDATE TO EXTREMELY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: ROD WAS BROKEN WHEN ARRIVED!!..SENT FOR A REPLACEMENT WILL UPDATE..RECEIVED NEW ROD AND IT IS FANTASTIC!!..PAIRED IT WITH MY RECENTLY PURCHASED OKUMA REEL AND I'M IN HEAVEN!!
customer_reviews.author: A.Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this rod
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these rods, and 1 broke the first day we used it, broke it while breaking it free from the downrigger. Looked great on the downrigger plenty bend to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for trolling trout and up to blues and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for trolling trout and up to blues and stripers. A bit heavy, but no big deal as its in a rod holder all the time. Triangle grip is a little awkward at first.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: half of pole missing 😕
customer_reviews.text: Received package well I was away on business, opened box and upper half pole missing.. now I won't have mg pole for laker season thst doesn't last long... not happy at all.. PLEASE MAME THIS RIGHT
customer_reviews.author: laura valdez

customer_reviews.title: and a perfect lead core line rod
customer_reviews.text: Managed to use this rod over the weekend on Lake Michigan trolling (Used 5 color 28 lb lead core, with Hi Vis backing, and flies and spoons) with an Okuma reel. Rod is of high quality, and a perfect lead core line rod. Many people just use down rigger rods for lead core (including me), which work fine. Caught one fish on it on a slower day (guessing that luck had nothing to do with the rod, but nonetheless ...). This one seems to work just a hair nicer than typical downrigger rod, the engineering must have gone into it for that purpose (as opposed to just calling it one). For the price and quality, I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBonneville

customer_reviews.title: Pole snaps in half easily
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Pole broke when I was pulling out of downrigger release first day
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Butt is too long.
customer_reviews.text: Butt of pole makes it hard to use in boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is: the lower guides too small.
customer_reviews.text: The lower guides should be bigger. Other than that it great!
customer_reviews.author: Lowlin Saepharn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews the rod snapped in half. Purchase a different product
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leinonen

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Seems good. But had to search for it for a while since lazy delivery driver threw it in our bushes and not on our dry covered deck.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: They BOTH Snapped!!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, not 6 days after the 30 day return policy is up both of these (bought 2 of yet the same day) snapped in half in the exact same spot!!! Ugh...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: rugged
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for this rod. Very nice construction. I used this fishing for salmon on the ocean. Works great. Highly recommend for the price. It will haul in the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Pro 3

customer_reviews.title: Works great for catfishing
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a "Salmon" rod. However it works great for catfishing.
customer_reviews.author: Monster Trophy Catfish

customer_reviews.title: Hope you get it all
customer_reviews.text: Only got half a pole pretty sad a well known fishing company sends half a pole....
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: great rod for carp has an awsome flex not stiff ...
customer_reviews.text: great rod for carp has an awsome flex not stiff enough for catfish though but definatly a 5 star carp rod love the handle grip as well
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Alexander Vincent McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Tip broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: Tip broke 3" from end when taking up slack to store rod. Will repair myself.
customer_reviews.author: ratchet

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars. Hooked up and landed multiple salmon. Great rod for the price. If you can’t land a salmon with this rod then your either doing something wrong or need a new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B Slater

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the price. I used it for a different application then it's ment for. I used it as a bait rod for bull reds and big black drum works excellent!!! Paired it with a penn squidder can cast pretty far with it! Great strength for 30lbs plus fish.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hurst

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first trip, didn't even put that much weight on it and it exploded on me
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Plums classic got rod’s
customer_reviews.text: Use this rod salmon fishing Lake Michigan either copper or lead c ore works as it should great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work good on big fish.
customer_reviews.text: nice looking and very strong will haul in the big ones
customer_reviews.author: charlie williams

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: Pole was broken when I received it.....been waiting all week for my fishing trip and this.........
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Withrow

customer_reviews.title: The price is not appropriate.
customer_reviews.text: It is not bait casting well. Second piece is so weak. The price is not appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The Pole came quickly and it is everything that it is rated to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped only half the rod
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with only the bottom half of each rod
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged when I received it rod eye was bent
customer_reviews.author: Todd van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent rod for the price. With the Okuma Magda Pro Line Counter Level Reel. Nice setup.
customer_reviews.author: Petey B

customer_reviews.title: 6 lb buffalo great
customer_reviews.text: first time out cot a 26.6 lb buffalo great rod
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rod for trolling can't waste to break it in
customer_reviews.author: Patty wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... this rod is an outstanding value for the money nice big cat pole to trolling stripers put my penn ...
customer_reviews.text: Not to much on 2 piece rods but this rod is an outstanding value for the money nice big cat pole to trolling stripers put my penn squider on it this thing. Could take on tuna lots of eyes
customer_reviews.author: Kenard W. Cleghorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised - haven't caught anything with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Aut

customer_reviews.title: my fishing rod came with a missing guide hole the ...
customer_reviews.text: my fishing rod came with a missing guide hole the second one from the bottom... trying to see if they well replace my rod are fix the guide hole
customer_reviews.author: nigel linton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel and action
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I had hoped. Excellent feel and action. Couldn't be more pleased and for the price, it is well worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. When received, tip was broken from one. Tip not in box so must have been packed that way. Rods seemed cheaply made and stiffer than I thought they should. I'm returning both and ordering higher quality rods from Cabelas. These are inexpensive rods but once I saw them, they looked like they'd break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great rod Okuma has never let me down and as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod Okuma has never let me down and as a Charter Captain on the Great Lakes it gets a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fast reaction of the seller to resend me the new one and it was great
customer_reviews.author: Zahra G M Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rod just wish I would have ordered the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rod just wish I would have ordered the one that's 6 inches longer .but that's just me . It's a good trolling rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rod I received was 10ft. 6in. and heaver than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Maxian

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this rod based on power line rating as ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rod based on power line rating as advertised (10-25 lbs) But the 8'-6" 2 piece rod actually says 10-20 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Just received the 2 I bought. I have several okuma products and unlike the the rest, the build quality on these 2 rods suck. There are crooked eyes and they are not all inline. The add says 10 to 25 lbs. they are only rated for 20 lbline max. The eyes on one aren't even in line with the reel seat. DONT BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Great rods!
customer_reviews.text: Great rods, and the price can't be beat. My husband and I are running 2 of these on top of Scotty 1085 downriggers in Alaska for King Salmon. Paired with 60 lb braided line / 100 lb leader, we pulled out a 25 lb Chinook on the first trip without issues. These rods stand up to the fight like a champ! The arrived on time as well, no issues with packaging.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAK

customer_reviews.title: good rods, good price
customer_reviews.text: they are great rods for the money, i have 4 of these rods in my trolling lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod
customer_reviews.text: Great rod I love it! Price point is awesome and have already caught several salmon and steelhead with this rod. The action and feel to this inexpensive rod is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Bend
customer_reviews.text: I bought two rods. I was expecting a lot more flexibility at the tip for a rod rated for 10-20 lb test. The rigid tips would more fit a 15-35 lb line. I'll still use them, but probably only as back-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Fillet em long

customer_reviews.title: Very good rods for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the rods they are a great value for the price would buy again. These are a much better value compaired to similar priced rods.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Boing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The actions great work well with reel. One thing one of the eye was damaged during shipping .
customer_reviews.author: tdb00009

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Okuma. They make very quality products for a reasonable price. I am an amateur fisherman at best. I prefer quality gear, but I can't justify spending tons of money on a fishing pole or reel. I have about 10 Okuma products and I either really like or love all of them. I have a 3 rods, 5 reels and two wall mountable rod holders. Plus, free shipping, can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but telescopic feature does not reduce rod length much
customer_reviews.text: This rod is specified as telescopic. It is only telescopic at the butt end reducing the rod length only about 18". I needed it to reduce to 6ft or less for storage so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: look and feel like quality rods
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use them yet but they look and feel like quality rods. Will update again after my 1st few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Iroc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Trolling Rods
customer_reviews.text: Love these rods for trolling, I have bought 4 of these now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I was quite pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this rod trolling for lake trout this summer. I was quite pleased with it, particularly with respect to its price in comparison to other trolling rods.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These rods have served us well for several salmon trips to Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Downwind Advantage

product_meta.title: Okuma Classic Pro GLT & Rods
product_meta.description: The Classic Pro Dipsy Diver trolling rods from Okuma® are designed with double-footed guides and titanium oxide inserts. A rubber shrink tube butt section improves durability and rod-holder removal, while a tip-over butt ferrule section increases strength.
feature_bullets: Package Dimensions: 3" ( H ) x 7" ( L ) x 3" ( W )

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
